audit_history.note: Corrected pre-AURORA docs that referenced non-SQLite storage and JSON file persistence.
Removed the no-JSON persistence proscription; SQLite remains the authoritative store but JSON may be used for interchange artifacts.

description: All operational data for Dumptruck (history, dedup indicators, analysis artifacts, metadata) is persisted in a single SQLite database file. SQLite is the authoritative persistent store; JSON may be used for interchange artifacts such as report outputs, API payloads, or optional exports.
name: SQLite is the primary persistent store
